gf01_1a.description: 1.2 What is your date of birth?, day

gf01_1b.description: 1.2 What is your date of birth?, month

gf01_1c.description: 1.2 What is your date of birth?, year

vn8.description: 2. Who is the head of the household?

s5_n.description: 5.1 What was the last year of studies you completed? (Level)

s5_g.description: 5.1 What was the last year of studies you completed? (Grade)

vn9_n.description: 5.2 What was the last year of schooling completed by the head of your household/spouse/partner?

vn9_g.description: 5.2 What was the last year of schooling completed by the head of your household/spouse/partner?

vn11.description: 7. How many full bathrooms with shower and W.C. (excused) there is for the exclusive use of the members of your home?

vn15.description: 8.How many cars or vans do you have in your home, including enclosed vans, or with cabin or box?

gf07.description: 9. Without taking into account the mobile connection you may have from a cell phone, does this home have Internet?

gf08.description: 10. OF all persons aged 14 years or over living in the household, How many worked in the last month?

gf09.description: 11.In this house, how many rooms are used to sleep, not counting corridors or bathrooms?

puntaje_amai6x7.description: Scores to calculate SES by AMAI 6x7: esc_amai6x7 (education_score_amai6x7) cuartos_amai6x7 (rooms_score_amai6x7) banos_amai6x7 (bathrooms_score_amai6x7) autos_amai6x7 (cars_score_amai6x7) internet_amai6x7 (internet_score_amai6x7) personas_amai6x7 (people_score_amai6x7) puntaje_amai6x7 (amai_6x7_score)
